resources.string:
GUATEMALA. 

Guatemala officially the Republic of Guatemala (Spanish: Rep√∫blica de Guatemala), 

is a country in Central America bordered by Mexico to the north and west, 

Belize and the Caribbean to the northeast, Honduras to the east, El Salvador 

to the southeast and the Pacific Ocean to the south. With an estimated 

population of around 17.2 million, it is the most populous country in 

Central America.
A trip to the heart of the Mayan world
